evidence: Today we'll wrap up our MRI part by explaining pulse sequences.
We'll also review the overall architecture of an MRI scanner and a few related concepts that tie everything together.
The main emphasis today follows the green book chapter, so I strongly encourage you to read that section carefully.
I'll also share a few extra details and insights that go beyond the textbook-these will help you develop a deeper and more practical understanding of MRI as a whole.
